mapper.sql: ${tableName}.oid as ${tableAsName}_oid, ${tableName}.pid as ${tableAsName}_pid, ${tableName}.label as ${tableAsName}_label, ${tableName}.name as ${tableAsName}_name, ${tableName}.remake as ${tableAsName}_remake, ${tableName}.add_user_id as ${tableAsName}_addUserId, ${tableName}.add_user_name as ${tableAsName}_addUserName, ${tableName}.add_date_time as ${tableAsName}_addDateTime, ${tableName}.opt_user_id as ${tableAsName}_optUserId, ${tableName}.opt_user_name as ${tableAsName}_optUserName, ${tableName}.opt_date_time as ${tableAsName}_optDateTime, ${tableName}.del_flg as ${tableAsName}_delFlg
mapper.insert:
insert into id_role ( oid, pid, label, name, remake, add_user_id, add_user_name, add_date_time, opt_user_id, opt_user_name, opt_date_time, del_flg ) values
( #{saveObj.oid}, #{saveObj.pid}, #{saveObj.label}, #{saveObj.name}, #{saveObj.remake}, #{saveObj.add_user_id}, #{saveObj.add_user_name}, #{saveObj.add_date_time}, #{saveObj.opt_user_id}, #{saveObj.opt_user_name}, #{saveObj.opt_date_time}, #{saveObj.del_flg} )
